scripts.compile:windows:32: npm run build && nexe build/app.js -o bin/TetriVersal-win32.exe --target windows-x86-14.15.3
scripts.compile:windows:64: npm run build && nexe build/app.js -o bin/TetriVersal-win64.exe --target windows-x64-14.15.3
scripts.compile:linux:32: npm run build && nexe build/app.js -o bin/TetriVersal-linux32 --target linux-x86-14.15.3
scripts.compile:linux:64: npm run build && nexe build/app.js -o bin/TetriVersal-linux64 --target linux-x64-14.15.3
